attributes.action: Implement a One-Way System on Hillfield Road, Sparkhill, Birmingham B11 3LJ
attributes.additional_details: I am writing to formally request the implementation of a one-way system on Hillfield Road due to ongoing congestion and safety concerns. The current two-way traffic flow has led to frequent accidents and difficulties navigating the narrow street. Notably, neighboring streets operate as one-way, exacerbating the issue. Converting Hillfield Road to a one-way street, preferably from top to bottom, would alleviate congestion and enhance safety for motorists. I urge your department to consider this proposal, emphasizing the benefits of improved traffic flow and reduced accident risk. Your prompt attention to this matter is greatly appreciated.
attributes.background: I am requesting for Implementation of One-Way System on Hillfield Road, Sparkhill, Birmingham B11 3LJ

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about local roads are a matter for the relevant local authority, not the UK Government or Parliament.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them, by entering your post code here: https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors

You may also be able to petition your local authority directly.
